column3: str

Eshana wants your assistance in training a new recruit.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Spar with the Ananta recruit in the Striped Hills.
Speak with the Ananta instructor.
Report to Eshana.

Have you a moment or two to ssspare, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>? I have an overconfident recruit who could benefit from a sssparring sssession with one of your experience.
Captain Alpa is expending every effort to sssecure our position here on the bridge, and we cannot afford to have unreliable sssoldiers in our ranksss.
You will find thisss recruit training with an inssstructor in the Striped Hills─open my sssister's eyes to her shortcomings, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
You... You're the eikon-ssslayer! What need do you have of one like me?
（★未使用／削除予定★）
You've come to train our ssstone-headed sssister? Good. She has talent for the ssspear and the blade, but has yet to learn the value of humility.
If you're ready to ssspar, then let usss be about it!
Do your worssst!

But, I thought...
I need to catch my breath...
（★未使用／削除予定★）
You ssstrike with admirable force, but do not underessstimate your opponent.
I appreciate the way you humbled her, ssstrider. Watching you fight was as much a joy for me as it was a lessson for her.
And now that you have knocked her down, it will be my job to build her up again─thisss time with better habitsss I should hope. Eshana will be pleased.
How went the training?
Hah! You ssspared her no mercy, then! That is good. I only hope that the change to her perssspective lasssts longer than her bruises.
And if it doesn't, well...I may sssend you for another sssparring match!
Return to Eshana─I will follow up on the “educational” drubbing you gave my sssister.
